definitions.definition: ( golf , countable , uncountable ) Deviation of the path of a rolling ball from a straight line; slope; slant.
examples: This putt has a big left-to right borrow on it.

definitions.definition: ( construction , civil engineering ) A borrow pit .
( programming ) In the Rust programming language, the situation where the ownership of a value is temporarily transferred to another region of code.

main_definition: ( golf , countable , uncountable ) Deviation of the path of a rolling ball from a straight line; slope; slant.
secondary_definitions: ( construction , civil engineering ) A borrow pit .
( programming ) In the Rust programming language, the situation where the ownership of a value is temporarily transferred to another region of code.

definitions.definition: A ransom ; a pledge or guarantee .

main_definition: ( archaic ) A ransom ; a pledge or guarantee .
secondary_definitions: ( archaic ) A surety ; someone standing bail .
